findings.title: Unprotected function
findings.description: `setClaimRewardAsTokensPercentage` has no access modifier, allowing anyone to set the claim reward percentage.

findings.title: Lack of input validation
findings.description: Functions like `transfer`, `approve`, and `allowance` do not validate user inputs, potentially leading to reentrancy attacks or unauthorized actions.

findings.title: Unsecured blacklist functionality
findings.description: The `blacklist` function has a verdict of "! Low", indicating potential security risks.

findings.title: Insufficient access control
findings.description: Some functions, like `transferOwnership`, do not have sufficient access controls, allowing unauthorized users to transfer ownership.

findings.title: Inadequate testing
findings.description: Functions like `rebase` and `mint` have no test verdicts, indicating potential security risks due to lack of testing.

findings.title: Elevate Impact to Smart Contract's Safety and Security due to Active Owner Privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contractâ€™s safety and security.
